results.title: Antihypertensive Drugs and Risk of Depression: A Nationwide Population-Based Study.
results.text_hl: Individual drugs associated with decreased @<m>DISEASE_Depressive_Disorder</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003866 @@@depression@@@ included 2 of 16 angiotensin agents: @CHEMICAL_Enalapril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004656 @@@enalapril@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Ramipril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017257 @@@ramipril@@@; 3 of 10 calcium antagonists: @CHEMICAL_Amlodipine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@, @CHEMICAL_Verapamil @CHEMICAL_MESH:D014700 @@@verapamil@@@, and @CHEMICAL_Verapamil @CHEMICAL_MESH:D014700 @@@verapamil@@@ combinations; and 4 of 15 beta-blockers: @CHEMICAL_Propranolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D011433 @@@propranolol@@@, @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@, @CHEMICAL_Bisoprolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017298 @@@bisoprolol@@@, and @CHEMICAL_Carvedilol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077261 @@@carvedilol@@@.

results.title: Atenolol versus the fixed combination of atenolol and nifedipine in stable angina pectoris.
results.text_hl: Exercise stress testing (Bruce protocol) at the end of each treatment period demonstrated that the time to the onset of @DISEASE_Pain @DISEASE_MESH:D010146 @@@pain@@@ and occurrence of 1 mm ST segment @<m>DISEASE_Depressive_Disorder</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003866 @@@depression@@@ improved significantly (P < 0.05 and P < 0.001 respectively) whilst on the fixed combination compared to @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ alone.

results.title: Atenolol once daily in angina.
results.text_hl: In comparison with placebo, @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ gave a significant increase in total work performed until the appearance of 1 mm ST segment @<m>DISEASE_Depressive_Disorder</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003866 @@@depression@@@ in bicycle exercise tests made between 3--4 p.m.
